name: Locked Bunker
description:
Hoping to find wealth and treasures, you trespassed and broke into an old bunker. You must have triggered something because you're now locked in with a clock ticking! Your friends are outside, trying to get out with the help of a few old manuals they found lying around. Watch out! There might be a traitor among them! Communication is key for you to get out in time.

Locked Bunker allows you to play online with friends (2 players minimum) and collaborate to unlock the door!
